dict.acceptation: 反对，表示异议（与 to 或 against连用）；

sent.orig: A try statement may have more than one except clause, to specify handlers for different exceptions.
sent.trans: 一个try语句可能包含多个except子句，分别指定处理不同的异常。

sent.orig: I know nothing about him except for the fact(except the fact) that he lives next door.
sent.trans: 只知道他住在隔壁，此外我对他一无所知。

sent.orig: One said he could not see anything except the blue of the sky.
sent.trans: 其中一个说除了蓝色的天空，他不看到任何东西。

sent.orig: She felt rather left out as everyone received an invitation except her.
sent.trans: 除了她之外别人都收到了请柬，为此她感到倍受冷落。

sent.orig: I'm sorry, I have nothing to pay you except some big bills.
sent.trans: 对不起， 我只带着大面额的钞票，没有零钱付给你。
